title: The Brilliant Firefly: Revolt Chapters 2&3
description:
The Brilliant Firefly is back! Chapters two and three are here, and there's more to come next week!

Thank you to this episode's sponsors: Daily Harvest and Revolution Math! Tune in at the very beginning of this episode to hear exclusive special offers.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
